data.name: HomePageText
data.value: This is main page of Web-diary app, here is no functionality to be realistic, and i, as developer don't know what to add here. Just ignore this page, it's useless.

data.name: 404Text
data.value: Resource for which you asked hasn't been found.

data.name: LoadingDiaries
data.value: Await, diaries and groups are loading...

data.value: Your email is not validated. Validate it first.

data.name: UnathorizedText

data.name: NotAuthPageText1

data.name: NotAuthPageText2

data.name: Display

data.name: ErrorPageMainTextPart1
data.value: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications.

data.name: ErrorPageMainTextPart2
